img_above_text:
![Wukong Pagoda 55.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/86/Wukong_Pagoda_55.jpg)
You can also try launching yourself to the archer in the window, by jumping and using a midair heavy attack to give yourself a boost over to the window... but do note that he's not alone.
img_below_text:
However you get across, you can find an entrance into the cell tunnel leading to where the archer was stationed, and encounter a Red-Haired Yaksha guarding a green Wisp to absorb, which is helpful for getting back some of your healing gourd after the fight.
![Wukong Pagoda 57.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/5d/Wukong_Pagoda_57.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 53 from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Pagoda 55.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/86/Wukong_Pagoda_55.jpg)
You can also try launching yourself to the archer in the window, by jumping and using a midair heavy attack to give yourself a boost over to the window... but do note that he's not alone."
            - Following Text: "However you get across, you can find an entrance into the cell tunnel leading to where the archer was stationed, and encounter a Red-Haired Yaksha guarding a green Wisp to absorb, which is helpful for getting back some of your healing gourd after the fight.
![Wukong Pagoda 57.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/5d/Wukong_Pagoda_57.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a confrontation between the player character and a Red-Haired Yaksha in a dark, dungeon-like environment. The Yaksha is guarding a green Wisp, which can be absorbed to restore some of the player's healing gourd after the fight. This scene follows the player's attempt to reach an archer in a window and precedes the discovery of an entrance into a cell tunnel.
